Description: JOB PURPOSE:Organize, plan, program, and supervise resources availability at stores and therefore contribute to the smooth functioning of port operations.KEY ACCOUNTABILITIES·      Ensure adequate record keeping and manage all documentation to confirm proper stock levels and maintain inventory control· Receive the materials supplied by the vendor as per the purchase order placed by the Purchase Department·      Follow the rejected items with Procurement dept·      Follow inspection status with end user and closing PO on time·      Follow all standards for issuing and receiving stock within the store's area of operation.·      Check the materials thoroughly for quality, quantity, specification condition, etc.·      Refuse acceptance of damaged, unacceptable, or incorrect items.·      categories the materials category wise and stock in the appropriate locations.·      take appropriate action for care and preservation of the materials.·      Periodical stock verification and always ensure correctness of stock.·      Investigating inventory shortages and discrepancies·      Work closely with Purchasing to order and receive items and Material.·      Mediate any confrontations between staff and clients and de-escalate the situation.·      Analysis the aging of stocks & communication the management about obsolete Stock.·      inspect items from any breakages and damages.·      Ensure that the store is kept clean and organized.·      Assist stores keeper in managing inventory controls.·      Ensure that Stores staff is in good attendance, well presented and all work is carried out in compliance with DP World Safety Environment Policy and SOPs.Skills
